segments.text: Thank you . I am glad that everything turned out so well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who taught you how to cook this well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took a cooking class at the Culinary Institute .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , what is in this chicken dish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Isn't that great ? That is coconut ginger chicken with rice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the soup a shrimp soup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is shrimp in there along with sea vegetables and lemon grass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I got lucky in choosing a wine that blends with this meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I appreciate you bringing the wine . It goes well with the chicken .
segments.speaker: S2
